players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote for Charlie to protect the town."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is innocent. Diana must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
You: "I believe Diana. Charlie's claim doesn't make sense - why investigate me when Diana already revealed as detective?"
Diana: "I stand by my investigation. Charlie is the mafioso and is trying to deceive us. Alice, your support is spot on—let's vote him out to save the town."
Charlie: "Diana is lying about being detective. I investigated Alice and she is innocent. Diana is the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote Diana to save the town."
You: "I am voting for Charlie. Diana's detective claim is consistent and Charlie's counter-claim doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
